resources.string: %1$s is unable to use HMS Core. Launch Optimizer (Phone Manager) or go to Settings, enable all permissions for %2$s (including auto-launch and secondary launch), and try again.
Failed to download HMS Core package.
Not enough free space. Download cannot be completed.
HMS Core must be installed to use this feature. Install?
Update to the latest version of HMS Core to use this feature. Update now?
This service requires the latest version of the following app:\n\n%1$s
No Wi-Fi connection. Download using mobile data?
Please allow the app to access your location
Uygulamayı kullanabilmeniz için konum servisini aktif etmeniz gerekmektedir.
%s is required to update this app. Install now?
Update available. Please download and install the latest version.
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
Unable to retrieve information. Please try again later.
No Internet connection. Please check your network settings.
Your version is up to date.
